example.en: It isn't easy to translate all your comments into Standard German.

example.en: Such comments made a valuable contribution to understanding the syntax and grammar of the Hebrew language.

example.en: So they immediately began posting a lot of critical comments.

example.en: Writer Celso Carunungan commented on “a feeling of holiness, that when you get inside you are going to confront your Creator.”

example.en: Brother Call then asked me to comment on this section.

example.en: What it does mean is that you can more easily brush off potentially hurtful comments .
example.vi: Mà có nghĩa là bạn sẽ dễ dàng phớt lờ đi những lời chỉ trích bình luận có thể khiến mình bị tổn thương .
